body.transcript:
Hello! My name is Sarah, and I'm with RT 6 Boozers. How can I assist you today?

Hi, Sarah! I'm just looking for some information about your happy hour specials.

I'd be happy to help with that! But first, may I have your name?

Sure, my name is John.

Nice to meet you, John! To better assist you, could you please provide me with your email address?

Of course, it's john.doe@email.com.

Thank you, John. And could you also share your phone number, please?

Sure, it’s four zero four, two one two, three four five six.

Great! Now, regarding our happy hour specials, we offer half off on select drinks from five PM to seven PM, seven days a week.

That sounds awesome! Thank you for the information, Sarah.

You're welcome, John! Thank you for your time, and have a great day!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Brian Johnson from RT 6 Boozers discusses customer service with Dorothy Anderson. The agent provides assistance and information about Bar.

Great! Now, regarding our happy hour specials, we offer half off on select drinks from five PM to seven PM, seven days a week.

You're welcome, John! Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
